thread.title: Natalie Barnes
thread.title_full: Love Energy Savings reviewed by Natalie Barnes

author: Natalie Barnes
title: Natalie Barnes
text: Kimberley Richards has been very helpful and informative in helping me look at a competative energy supplier whilst moving office premises. Kim called back exactly when she said she would and throughly explained all aspects of the new tariff and supplier.
